1469350.name: Save the Planet
1469350.description: Naturally, your number one task is to kill the monsters! Just don’t let them cross the red line on the right. To do this, move monsters on the right to other rows and collect combinations of three identical monsters at the end of the line. But these monsters are tricky! With each step, if there’s no completed combination, the monsters shift one position to the right. Track your progress as you go and Save the Planet in  60 match3  levels with escalating complexity!
1469350.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
